```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(rvest)
library(polite)

```

```{r}
url <- 'https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0111161/reviews?ref_=tt_urv'
sesh<- bow(url,
           user_agent = "Educational")
sesh
```

```{r}
username <- character(0)
reviewerDate<- character(0)
revContent <- character (0)
stars<- character(0)

```

```{r}
page <- read_html(url)
revContent<- scrape (sesh) %>%
  html_nodes('text show-more__control')%>%
  html_text
revContent
```

```{r}
username <- scrape (sesh)%>%
  html_nodes('display-name-link')%>%
  html_text
username
```

```{r}
reviewerDate <- scrape(sesh)%>%
  html_nodes('review-date')%>%
  html_text
reviewerDate
```

```{r}
stars<- scrape (sesh)%>%
  html_nodes('point-scale')%>%
  html_text
stars  
  
```

```{r}
DF <- data.frame(Usernames = username,
                 Reviewer_Date = reviewerDate,
                 Reviewer_Content = revContent,
                 Rating = stars)
```
